abilities.name: Know-wotz
abilities.rule: While this model is within 3" of one or more friendly **ORKS VEHICLE** units, this model has the Lone Operative ability.

abilities.name: Mekaniak
abilities.rule: At the end of your Movement phase, you can select one friendly **ORKS VEHICLE** model within 3" of this model. That **VEHICLE** model regains up to D3 lost wounds, and, until the start of your next Movement phase, each time that **VEHICLE** model makes an attack, add 1 to the Hit roll. Each model can only be selected for this ability once per turn.
